name: Multi Functional Cloth Washing Brush Shoe Scrub Brush
description: Easy to use: Open the cap on the top of the brush. Now, fill it with soap to fill the body and lock it in place. To start cleaning, simply press the button and it sprays soap or cleaning solution through the brush head.

Easy to store: This cloth washing brush comes with a silicone cord and is therefore very easy to hang. Also, please dry the brush completely after use. Do not leave in water for a long time. This will damage the bristles. Also, please do not put it in the dishwasher. That can seriously destroy the brush.
Ergonomic design: This shoe scrubbing brush is easy to hold, easy to apply force and can clean clothes, shoes of all types very well.

You must first brush the surface. i.e brush against the lie of the material. This is to remove all the dust that is trapped inside it. Then brush down the nap for a smooth finish. If you want to brush out a mark, brush it with short, quick strokes, but never poke at cloth or you will break the fiber.

This brush is a true multi-functional item. This can be used as a dry brush while there is no liquid in its dispenser. Also, it can be used as a liquid scrubbing brush both as a shoe scrub brush to clean your shoes. Again you can also use it to clean your clothes during laundry.

First knock the shoe gently and knock off the dirts and dry muds off it. Then you add cleaning solution on the dispenser. Now, soak the shoe in hot water and scrub it with the brush and press the brush to add in the solution while cleaning. Finally dry the shoe properly to use it again next time.
Please note that multiple types of shoe materials get damaged if contacted with water. For such shoes, please clean with the dry form of brush without any solution in the dispenser.
short_description: Product Details:
Easy to use: With simple design, a cloth washing brush is extremely easy to use.
Easy to store: With a silicone hanging rope design to hang from the wall, it is very easy to store and use again.
Ergonomic design: This shoe scrubbing brush is easy to hold, easy to apply force and can clean clothes, shoes of all types very well.
Multi-functional: This brush can be used for both shoe scrubbing, cloth brushing and can be even used for dish brushing in the kitchen.

name: Body Shower Exfoliating Bathing Sponge (Pack of 3)
description: This is a bathing sponge made of artificial Eco-friendly material. It comes as a hard sponge which gets softer on soaking water and then gets harder once it dries. Therefore it gives you a great feeling to use and scrub your face and body with.

It is a multi-use item. You can scrub your face and softer body parts without soap for gentle exfoliation. Also you can use it for a bit harder peeling effect and remove the dead skin cells from thicker skins of your body.

It is the most hygienic of all the bath loofahs alternative to it. Loofahs made of natural sea sponge or cotton, mesh or grid structures carry dead skin cells, soap residue and dirt inside them and soon become a breeding ground of bacteria. Having no such structure, this sponge has no such problem only.
This sponge is one of the greatest item to experience a gentle bubble bath or soothing shower. And it is easy to clean after too.
Once in a week, for health reasons, please soak it in bleaching powder or baking soda solution for 15 minutes and then rinse it afterwards. This will keep it squeaky clean to the end.

Shower sponges should be replaced frequently. In the case of a loofah, aim for getting a new one every four to six weeks. Natural sea sponges should be replaced even more frequently, typically every three to four weeks. Our shower sponge can last a bit longer being a more hygienic option, but still, we recommend changing it every six weeks to avoid health concerns.

Mix one tablespoon of baking soda per cup of water in a small mug or bucket. Then, soak your bathing sponge for 15 minutes on this mixture each week or two. After that, rinse and allow to air dry. In addition to thoroughly cleaning the sponge, baking soda revives the sponge's internal structure for increased durability.

In short, shower puffs made of natural sponges are not hygienic. But our shower puffs are made of Eco-friendly artificial materials and have a different kind of structure that doesn’t let dead skins and bacteria grow inside it. So our loofahs are safe and hygienic, while your ordinary plastic or natural sea sponges aren’t.
short_description: Product Details:
First, you need to soak it in the water for a while. Also, don’t use soap or gel on it, just scrub it to your body with water.
Sponge becomes soft once exposed to water – it will harden after drying and will not affect normal use. It will become soft again after soaking and can be used repeatedly like this.

This product is suitable for adults and children equally. Father, mother, child, i.e. full family can use it. But for hygiene reason, one should use one sponge par person and that is the healthier practice.
This powerful soft sponge not only removes dirt from the body but also effectively cleans and exfoliates your dead skin cells.

name: Waterproof Foldable Play Mat For Floor Crawl
description: Place the baby on this waterproof mat around 3 times a day. The interaction is best when the baby is awake.
Doctors also advise that the baby should be with bare minimum clothes while on the mat. This helps them grow the feeling of touch and sensory nerve stimulations.
Finally, allow the baby to explore the mat at his/her own ease. If your baby can sit or crawl a bit, placing a few toys around the mat will help them grow better.
Do not wash the mat, dry clean only. In case it is soiled, you can clean the dirty area with a damp cloth.
This mat is totally safe for babies. It is recommended to use it till the baby starts crawling at a speed.

Large and Reversible - This large one piece play mat is big for your baby to crawl around. It also helps achieve their milestones by preventing bumping head on the floor. In addition, double sides with cute patterns, your baby will have a happy tummy time on!

Large and Reversible - This large one piece play mat is big for your baby to crawl around. It also helps achieve their milestones by preventing bumping head on the floor. In addition, double sides with cute patterns, your baby will have a happy tummy time on!

Foldable and Portable - With foldable design and a carrying bag, the mat can be folded and stored in seconds. You can carry it to a kids club house, for an outdoor picnic or other activities, protecting your child from dirty carpets and floors.

Soft and BPA Free - With a thickness of 0.6cm, the play mat is safe for slips and falls during your baby's tummy time. It protect your child from cold floors too. Without any sharp corners or edges, this mat will provide good cushioning when your baby is learning to crawl or walk.

Waterproof and Easy To Clean - The surface is waterproof, you could enjoy how easy the crawling mat is to clean, wipe it a few times with disinfectant or tissues. And no worries about coming apart or dirt / lint falling between the seams!

Super Light and Safe - Made of silicone, it retains its shape like memory foam even after prolonged usage, super light and with no taste or smell. We aim to provide the best health care for your kids!

You can use a play mat from day one. But, babies between three to six months old will love it the most. During this stage, your little star develops hand-eye coordination. So the colorful play mat really helps them grow. It also helps in growing their muscles during their tummy time. Tummy time is necessary for body growth, as per doctors. So, your baby will be using the playmat for at least 3 to 4 months if not more.

Our foldable playmats are not traditional non-slip mats. Instead, they are designed to be used on both sides while still providing cushioning. If you find your play mat slipping on your carpet or hard floors you can place a non-slip mat underneath. Check our site for non-slip traditional mats for this.

With a range of colors, materials, sounds, and textures a play mat will help keep your child entertained for many months. These crawling mats help them to develop important skills through play and exploration. If you can occasionally move the toys around and rearrange them this will give your child new things to try out. So, in short, a play mat help in growing a child’s cognitive skills and hand-eye co-ordinations.
short_description: Product Details:
With the great designs, it is Ideal for kids growth and learning.
It is a waterproof playmat and also it is easy to clean.
These crawling mats provide a safe and independent play space for your child.
The character designs are colorful, vivid and educational to stimulate child’s emotional and creative development
Finally, being non-toxic and baby-friendly, it is a perfect addition to kids room decor.

After you have filled it up, it will reach the maximum temperature soon, and then you can place it on your back or bed. Yes, most fitted covers, you can wash normally using a mild detergent. Some bags can be machine washed at 40 degrees which will be specified on the product descriptions. We do not recommend 3D covers are washed, just surface cleaned with a damp sponge.

name: Silicone Pastry Brush (Pack of 2)
description: Dishwasher Safe- The full silicone design of the pastry brush is easy to clean. Simply wipe in hot water and then bloat and dry in air.

Full Edible Silicone Material- It is hygienic and healthy and harmless to the body. Rubberfy kitchen utensils are made of full silicone material. You don’t need to worry about the pastry brush getting moldy, bristles loosening or so on. High quality edible silicone material makes the kitchenware more durable.

Full Edible Silicone Material- It is hygienic and healthy and harmless to the body. Rubberfy kitchen utensils are made of full silicone material. You don’t need to worry about the pastry brush getting moldy, bristles loosening or so on. High quality edible silicone material makes the kitchenware more durable.

Heat-resistant & Non-stick- Rubberfy silicone pastry brushes are nontoxic and environment-friendly. Also, they are non-stick and have high temperature resistance. The high frequency of use & withstand -40°C and 230°C high temperature. Anti scalding silicone handle protects your hand from burning and silicone head protects your pans. It keeps the cookware surface unscratched or dented.

Extra soft bristles: The soft bristles of the brush helps you design creme or paint oil on top of your cake/ pastry without scratching the smooth surface. This is especially helpful while creating designer cookies or special pastries.

The best breads achieve their golden-brown crust from an egg wash or melted butter spread on top before you put them in the oven. Or when you need to grease a pan, using a food brush helps you do it quickly and cleanly. If you've added too much seasoning, a brush can even be dipped in water and brushed against a dish to remove the extra seasoning. The uses for a pastry brush in your kitchen can pile up quickly.
First, always clean your traditional pastry brush immediately after using them.
Start by placing your brush under a stream of warm water.
Then gently rub the bristles with a dish detergent to remove grease..
Next you can sanitize by soaking the pastry brushes into a bleach solution after washing, using a pint of water with a half of cap full or a teaspoon of bleach.
Leave the brush for 15 minutes in the water, and then rinse the brush once again with warm water.
Blot with towel and lay it flat to dry.
Allow to air dry completely before putting it back into the utensil drawer.

Strictly speaking, a basting brush is a cooking utensil that is specifically used for basting meats, fish, poultry, and other food items. Similarly, the pastry brush is one that is used only on pastries and cakes.

name: Jade Massage Roller Face Massage Tool
description:
Net Quantity: 1.00
Includes: Device handle * Roller * Eye Stone

Grab the handle of the face massage roller and move it up or down on the face, neck, or other skin parts. Every day you need to do this for about 10 to 20 minutes. So, this helps your skin and muscles to relax.

We create the jade roller tools using natural jade stones. We do not use non-organic elements or infused glasses. Thus, our product is 100% Eco-friendly. So, it ensures healthy and natural treatment. This also eliminates the risk of an allergic reaction to your skin. So, you won‘t have to worry about any side effects.
We make the jade massage roller and tool-set from a real jadeite stone. This is why our stone guarantees the organic properties of the product. Also, that's why it is 100% natural and organic.
It is a traditional Asian skincare treatment to use jade stone. Also, it is the best beauty secret of Indian civilizations to have healthy and glowing skin.

Use our jade massage roller daily to reduce itchiness, lines, wrinkles, dark circles, etc. Thus, improve your skin tone. The act of jade rolling is very comforting and indulgent. It helps to reduce facial tension and leads to a relaxed feeling. You can cool down the massage tool in the refrigerator to improve its anti-inflammatory effects.
Start from the middle of the face and roll towards the cheeks.
- Move up to the eyebrows and roll upwards along the forehead.
- Proceed beyond the lower lip and roll down through the chin.
Use the smaller end for more delicate areas and tricky places, use the larger end for bigger surfaces.
We recommend jade rolling twice a day. You can massage once in the morning and once in the evening after washing your face. However, you can use the jade roller as many times as you want.
Jade rollers can be used with oils and serums for added penetration and absorption into the skin.
After each use, you can wash your face massage tool with warm water and mild soap. You can then dry the tools with a soft, thin cloth.
You can keep the tool in a small dry box. Please make sure your tools are completely dry before storage!
For an added cooling effect, one can keep his/her facial beauty tools like the jade rollers in the fridge.

As an organization, we support the environmental movement so that we can live in a cleaner and healthier planet.

Traditional mats can be an excellent surface for yoga practice. However, these plastic mats (polyvinyl chlorides) that release toxic chemicals into the atmosphere. Toxic additives mix into their surroundings in the form of gas and small particles. Thousands and thousands of mats and other products are made with PVC, and none are biodegradable or recyclable. Hence the need for more Eco-friendly alternatives.

There are a few different methods you can use to clean your mat. If it's not too dirty, soap and water will work fine. If it's pretty gross or you have shared it, then sanitizing solution is your best bet. And if you're in a hurry, a washing machine should work just fine.
The simplest way to clean your mat is using diluted dish soap and water. You shouldn't use too much soap. Doing so can make your mat slippery and dangerous.
